text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus naucorioides is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 2 to 5 centimetres (0.8 to 2.0 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus naucorioides grows on hemlock. It has been collected in Tennessee, in August.
